head.s: Ohioville creek bones are not human

p.s:
Some bones that were found in a
Ohioville , Pennsylvania
creek are no longer said to be human according the authorities .
Children found the bones when they were swimming under a train trestle .
The bones were found in Little Beaver Creek and are said to be from a dog , deer or another large mammal .

item.s:
"
Bones found in Ohioville creek are n't human
" —
The Pittsburgh Tribune-Review
, August 10 , 2008

"
Bones found in creek to be examined today
" —
The Beaver County Times
, August 7 , 2008

head.s: Etna motorcyclist killed when hit by tree

p.s:
A tree hit and killed an
Etna , Pennsylvania
motorcyclist .
A truck went rolling down a hill knocking a tree down which landed on the motorcycle .
Fifty-nine year old motorcyclist , Alan Brocklebank , was sent to the hospital after the 3 p.m. accident .
He died later that morning .
The pickup driver was charged by police with drunken driving and homicide .

item.s:
"
Motorcyclist killed in Etna when a tree hits his bike
" —
The Pittsburgh Tribune-Review
, August 10 , 2008

"
Motorcyclist In Etna Accident Dies
" —
The Pittsburgh Channel
, August 9 , 2008

"
Truck Flips Down Hill , 1 Killed In Etna Accident
" —
KDKA
, August 9 , 2008

head.s: Police dog found in Pasadena , California

p.s:
A K-9 dog , aged 10 , was found safely in Pasadena ,
California
.

The dog is a
Belgian Malinois
named Robby , weighing around 70-75 lbs.
The dog was saved by an unknown person on Friday morning .
The dog is in fine health and was returned to his police unit .

item.s:
"
Robby picked up by a Good Samaritan
" —
Houston Chronicle
, August 9 , 2008

"
Pasadena K-9 missing
" —
Houston Community Newspapers
, April 8 , 2008

p.s:
In
Somalia
a high ranked police chief has been killed in an attack that also resulted in the death of four civilians .
Grenades were involved in the attack .

This attack occurred near the Somali capital of
Mogadishu
.

The attack took place in a police station in the city of
Alamada
.
A witness said that bullets were coming from all directions , and that the attack resulted in the death of his son .

item.s:
AFP . "
Attack kills Somali police chief , civilians die in reply : witnesses
" —
Yahoo ! News
, August 9 , 2008

"
Somali police chief killed
" —
News 24
, August 9 , 2008

head.s: Cassini probe passes Saturn moon Enceladus

p.s:
NASA 's Cassini spacecraft zoomed past Saturn 's moon
Enceladus
at just 50 kilometres above its surface .
The probe attempted to take detailed images of active geysers on the moon , which may offer evidence for the additional existence of liquid water on the moon .

If water is confirmed this would be the first time
liquid
water is found outside of the Earth .

In other space news , NASA 's
Phoenix Lander
on Mars , which recently confirmed the presence of water ice on the planet , is analyzing a soil sample in its
TEGA
instrument today .

The results from the analysis are expected to establish whether the Martian soil contains
perchlorates
as earlier reports from the lander have indicated .

item.s:
"
Cassini Prepares for Monday Flyby of Saturn Moon
" —
SPACE.com
, August 8 , 2008

"
Soil Studies Continue at Site of Phoenix Mars Lander
" —
NASA
, August 8 , 2008
